text: Ned Ray McWherter (October 15, 1930April 4, 2011) was an American politician. He worked as the 46th Governor of Tennessee from 1987 to 1995. He worked as Speaker of the Tennessee House of Representatives from 1973 to 1987.Billy Stair, The Life and Career of Ned McWherter (State Public Affairs Office, 2011). McWherter died of cancer in Nashville, Tennessee. He was 80 years old. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Tennessee Category:Governors of Tennessee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Ned McWherter
